alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Inland Bay (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 14 at 3:57AM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Gusty winds will impact portions of central Bay County through 430 AM EDT/330 AM CDT/... At 357 AM EDT/257 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong showers along a line extending from 10 miles northwest of Lynn Haven to Panama City Beach to 17 miles west of Panama City. Movement was southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Panama City, Lynn Haven, Panama City Beach, Callaway, Springfield, Hiland Park, Tyndall Air Force Base, Parker, St Andrews State Park, Southport, Cedar Grove, Dirego Park, Beacon Beach, College Station, Gulf Resort Beach, Bayou George, West Panama City, Camp Flowers, Bahama Beach and Biltmore Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
